sentence.Network_en: Take your kitbag to the POW barracks marked 2.
sentence.Network_cn: 带著你的工具袋到集中营的2号兵营.

sentence.Network_en: Better dump your kitbag In your barracks, Captain. We can talk when you're done checking In.
sentence.Network_cn: 最好把你的工具袋放在你的兵营, 上校. 我们可以等你报到完再谈.

entry.tran: （尤指帆布做的士兵或水手的）行囊，背包
entry.def: A kitbag is a long narrow bag, usually made of canvas, in which soldiers or sailors keep their clothing and personal possessions.

auth_sentence.content: One boy, carrying a kitbag over his shoulder in true military style, kept humming to himself as he marched along.

auth_sentence.content: Giles' first instinct when chosen by England may well have been to add a tray to his kitbag.
